meaningMnemonic: There is a <radical>moon</radical> and a <radical>city</radical> inside your <kanji>lung</kanji>. Inside of your lung there is a city and above that city lies a moon. It’s a pretty sight, but also very strange. Moons and cities don’t usually reside inside lungs.
readingMnemonic: Having a moon and city inside your <kanji>lung</kanji> inspires you to write a <reading>hai</reading>ku (はい). Perhaps the city and moon are just metaphorical. Either way, a haiku is the best way to go about things here.
